name: Learning Resources Peekaboo Learning Farm - 10 Pieces, Ages 18+ Months Toddler Learning Toys, Counting and Sorting Toys, Farm Animals Toys,Stocking Stuffers
short_description: SURPRISE TOYS: Discover a farm friend surprise in this learning toy's colorful, countable barns

GIVE THE GIFT OF LEARNING: Whether you’re shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift! Ideal gift for Halloween, Christmas, Stocking Stuffers, Easter Baskets Stuffers or even for Homeschool.

product_description: Discover a world of farmyard fun and learning with the Peekaboo Learning Farm from Learning Resources! This versatile set features five colorful, numbered barns that open to reveal adorable animal finger puppets inside. Perfect for little hands, these durable two-piece barns help develop fine motor skills as children open and close them while finding their farm friends. Each barn comes in a vibrant color (red, orange, blue, green, and purple) with matching numbers, creating multiple learning opportunities from color recognition to counting. The sturdy animal finger puppets—including a cow, pig, chicken, and more—inspire imaginative play as children create their own farm stories or put on puppet shows. What makes this toy exceptional is how it grows with your child, starting with simple peek-a-boo games for babies and advancing to sorting, matching, and early math concepts for toddlers. The perfect size for small hands and made from high-quality materials that withstand enthusiastic play, this farm set makes an ideal gift for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion. Give your child the gift of learning disguised as pure farmyard fun!

product_description: Sing, pop, and count along with Melissa & Doug Poke-a-Dot® Old MacDonald’s Farm, an interactive board book that brings a classic children's song to life! This sturdy 20-page book features charming, farm-themed illustrations and built-in Patented Pop-a-Tronic™ buttons that make satisfying “click” and “pop” sounds when kids press them. With raised and flat pages, the buttons respond differently depending on how and where they’re pressed—front or back— keeping little hands engaged with multisensory fun. Designed with little learners in mind, the simple, easy-to-follow text keeps toddlers and preschoolers engaged with hands-on, screen-free fun—perfect for home, travel, or learning on the go. Kids can count animals, sing along, and build early skills like fine motor coordination and language development through interactive, screen-free play. Whether you're shopping for a birthday, holiday, or milestone gift, this delightful sing along book is a barnyard hit with kids ages 3 and up. This product is certified by the Forest Stewardship Council. FSC certification ensures that products come from responsibly managed forests that provide environmental, social, and economic benefits, and that forests are protected for future generations. Please note that FSC certification applies to new inventory only (FSC C156584)

product_description: Product Description Everyone is attracted to these magnetic animals! Twenty favorite wild and domesticated animals are rendered in vibrant color on these wooden magnets that are easy for small hands to position and reposition. Arrange and re-arrange the colorful magnets to make scenes, play games, and tell stories! Great for developing fine motor, sorting, grouping, and storytelling skills. Pieces store in a wooden crate with a handy snap-in plastic lid, perfect for both home and travel! For more than 35 years, Melissa and Doug has crafted wholesome, developmental preschool toys and wooden toys built to last — everything from a life-sized grocery store and play kitchen playset and play food to plush toys and puppets, role play costumes, arts & crafts, and road trip activities for kids. It’s the kind of kid-powered play that nurtures growth, sparks imagination, and builds confidence. From the Manufacturer From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
